meanings.definition: To make or become urban in character or style.
meanings.sent1: The city urbanizes as more skyscrapers are built.
meanings.sent2: The town urbanizes with the addition of new shopping centers.
meanings.sent3: The small village urbanizes when a coffee shop opens on the main street.
meanings.sent4: Her fashion sense urbanizes as she starts wearing more city-inspired clothing.
meanings.sent5: The music festival urbanizes the area, attracting a younger crowd with modern beats.

meanings.definition: To develop or improve the infrastructure of a city or town.
meanings.sent1: The government urbanizes the city by repairing roads and bridges.
meanings.sent2: The construction company urbanizes the neighborhood by installing new street lights.
meanings.sent3: The team of workers urbanizes the park by adding benches and playground equipment.
meanings.sent4: The volunteers urbanize the community garden, making it more accessible to all.
meanings.sent5: The organization urbanizes the school by providing new technology for classrooms.
